snippet.title: Scholar Of The Arcane Arts Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist it on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1650200/Scholar_of_the_Arcane_Arts/

Scholar of the Arcane Arts is an Action RPG where you must rely on your knowledge on how magic actually works to survive. As a Scholar you learn new spells by collecting scrolls of magic. You must solve puzzles, unlock secret dungeons, and defeat monstrous beings to find these powerful scrolls.
